title: Google will now guarantee some flight prices and pay you back if it's wrong
description: Here are all of Google's new travel tools and how they can help you plan your next vacation.

title: Why this $23 remote control is a must-have for productive workouts (and more)
description: The popular remote control is worn like a ring and allows you to do more than just wirelessly scroll TikTok.

title: AI could automate 25% of all jobs. Here's which are most (and least) at risk
description: AI can automate the most annoying parts of your job. But what if it can do your whole job?

title: Google's CEO calls Bard 'a souped-up Civic' compared to ChatGPT and Bing Chat
description: If at first you don't succeed...

title: Pop!_OS has a complicated name but it makes using Linux so easy
description: Here's what you need to know about System76's in-house Linux operating system, Pop!_OS.

title: Google launches Nearby Share Beta for sharing files between Windows and Android
description: The new beta app expands Google's Nearby Share tool so that it will now work with Windows PCs. Here's how to try it out.

title: OpenMandriva puts on a master class of Linux beauty and user-friendliness
description: The rolling release candidate of OpenMandriva is yet another Linux distribution that shows off KDE Plasma's elegance and efficiency.

title: Low and no-code paradox: Freeing up tech pros' time, but creating new entanglements
description: IT managers will need to constantly fight the complexity that may result from an unbridled proliferation of low and no-code apps.

title: AI-generated content will revolutionize how we work
description: AI is the electricity of the 21st century. Ignore it and your business will be left in the dark.

title: Okay, so ChatGPT just debugged my code. For real.
description: Not only can ChatGPT write code, it can read code. On one hand, that's very helpful. On the other hand, that's truly terrifying.
